Half Life 3 and Portal 3 in one game. Yes? No... oh, okay, well bye then.

WHO writes a review for a game already rated nearly a 100% by most critics?? Me. I give a high 80%. Easily a 87% but frankly after all the dick tugging its NOT THAT GOOD. Its NOT Skyrim. It has aged, veery well. Its awesome to mod, and has an awesome modding community. Its got a great place, all warm like, in my heart. But a silent hero (No voice acting of the good Dr?? Part of my markdown) that some weird chick decides shes in love with, shows more about the nerds writing it then me, the nerd playing it. You can always tell in scifi or fantasy if the author touched all of NO boobs in high school. Then of course went on to work at Valve. High praise boys!! LOVE this game. But its not Uncharted 2.

Historically significant, and its construction of its atmosphere is great, but that's about all I can say that's positive about this game, a potentially good game that is plagued by incessant puzzle solving (if I wanted that, I'd play a puzzle game), exceptionally unsatisfying gunplay, and very poor presentation - a good sci-fi story is here, but I'm not interested when it's delivered in 30 minute unskippable monologues.

The definitive first-person shooter of the last 10 years. Even in the modern era of gaming, this stands toe-to-toe with brand new titles; an unforgettable experience with sophisticated animation, presentation, and storytelling that comes full circle yet leaves countless questions. It's Valve's greatest masterpiece. Play and understand why the world still needs Half-Life 3.

Рекомендую поиграть вам в эту игру, если вы еще не играли. Уверен, вам понравится!

Legendary Game. The game is so extremely immersive and content filled. There is creativity beyond any other game I have ever seen. I found myself dumbfounded by some puzzles that were easily solvable by methods that are specific to only this game. (mainly due to physics). Its an old game, but the optimization allowed for me to run it at 200 fps so.... thats nice.

Worth every penny 10/10

The Second Chapter of an Epic Trilogy

Half-Life 2 seriously holds up after all these years. After having not played it since Episode 2 came out I gave it a replay and I can't tell you how refreshing it was. I've played, and fully enjoyed, plenty of shooters since, but there's something special about the classic-style shooter. No getting your back stuck on walls, no infinitely recharging health, no qte's or cutscenes, just point and shoot and enjoy the ride. 

And what a ride it is.
The best game I've ever played

Wouldn't it be Full-Life if there are 2 Half-Lives?

Half Life 2 - каноничный экшен, по [b]разнообразию и динамичности[/b] геймплея не уступающий современным играм типа Batman или Tomb Raider. Достаточно видов оружия, множество игровых миров - от токсичных тоннелей и пустыни до гигантской футуристичной Цитадели.
HL2 далеко не просто шутер: в решении многих задач оружие вам не поможет, придется использовать фантазию и подручные предметы. Недаром Valve сделала себе имя на HL и HL2.
Если вы еще не играли в Half Life - обязательно попробуйте и наслаждайтесь каждым моментом.

PS: И кстати, возможно, Valve ждет пока именно вы пройдете HL2, чтобы выпустить третью.

Świetna gra - w końcu Half-Life, to po pierwsze, a po drugie to czas i ilość pracy jaką włożono w tę produkcję (6 lat). W 2004 roku kiedy wydano Half-Life'a, wyprzedzał on niebotycznie inne produkcje, szczególnie pod względem interakcji gracza z środowiskiem go otaczającym a także obsługą starych komputrów, nie tracąc wiele na grafice, czy grywalności (działał on na DirectX 7 !!).
Polecam każdemu tą grę, ponieważ jest ŻYWĄ LEGENDĄ wśród gier komputerowych i dlatego DOMAGAMY SIĘ HALF-LIFE 3
Dziękuje bardzo!

[/b]
Which is pretty cool.

İnanmak zor olsa da, en nihayetinde burada… Half Life 2. Defalarca tüm zamanların en iyi oyunu seçilen Half Life’ın delicesine beklenen devamı. İlk oyun tüm dünyada (resmi kopya olarak) 8 milyondan fazla satmış, pc’ler için fps standartlarını belirlemiş, “mod yapımı” kavramını herkesin hayatına sokmuş ve bunun sonucu olarak, hayatımıza Counter-Strike adlı intermet kafe katili bir mod girmişti. Oyun sektörü için muhteşem bir başarıydı ve daha sonra yapılan her oyun, hatta Doom 3 bile, şöyle ya da böyle Half Life’tan etkilendi. Ancak şimdiye dek, onun başarısına yaklaşan hiçbir oyun olmadı.

Its a thinking man's shooter and is one of the flagship games of the last decade. Just like any other Valve game, it plays the best on computer. Unfortunately I was in middle school when it came out and didn't have the money for a machine capable to play this game. I played it first in 2007 as a part of the Orange Box. Finally satisfied, I can say that I liked it a lot. It proably wasn't as amaze-balls as it would have been in 2004, but the graphics hold up very well considering. Bottom line is Halflife 2 is a classic and if you have Steam, it should be in your library.
